dublinCore.dc:title: 111 HR 7218 IH: Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Mr. Lamborn) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to reauthorize the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area, Cache La Poudre National Heritage Area, and South Park National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of certain National Heritage Areas in the State of Colorado

subsection.header: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area
subsection.text: Section 8001(i) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (54 U.S.C. 320101 note; Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1229) is amended by striking the date that is 15 years after the date of enactment of this Act and inserting September 30, 2036.

subsection.header: Cache La Poudre National Heritage Area
subsection.text: Section 8002(i) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (54 U.S.C. 320101 note; Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1234) is amended by striking the date that is 15 years after the date of enactment of this Act and inserting September 30, 2036.

Section 8003(i) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (54 U.S.C. 320101 note; Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1240) is amended by striking the date that is 15 years after the date of enactment of this Act and inserting September 30, 2036.
